chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
aemi: applied_entries_monotonic_interface
smci: state_machine_correct_interface
si: sorted_interface
lacimi: lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
client: clientId
id: nat
out: output

Goal:
forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> in_output_trace client id out tr -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net))

Premises:
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
step_failure_init = fun (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) => ([], step_async_init) : forall (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0), list Net.name * network Arguments step_failure_init {P0 P}
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
applied_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (sigma : name -> raft_data) => match argmax (fun h : name => lastApplied (sigma h)) (all_fin N) with | Some h => rev (removeAfterIndex (log (sigma h)) (lastApplied (sigma h))) | None => [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (name -> raft_data) -> list entry Arguments applied_entries {orig_base_params raft_params} _%function_scope
step_failure_star = fun (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (params : FailureParams P) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_failure : forall (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0), FailureParams P -> step_relation (list Net.name * network) (Net.name * (input + list output)) Arguments step_failure_star {P0 P params}
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record SingleParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_SingleParams { init_handler : data; input_handler : input -> data -> list output * data
in_output_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) tr /\ in_output_list client id o os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> output -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments in_output_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams,
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Build_output_correct_interface : (forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> in_output_trace client id out tr -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net))) -> output_correct_interface
Record output_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_correct_interface { output_correct_invariant : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> in_output_trace client id out tr -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net)) } Arguments output_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
TR_obligation_3 : forall (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))) (s s' : list Net.name * network) (o : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refl_trans_1n_trace step_failure step_failure_init s tr -> ~ in_output_trace client id out tr -> step_failure s s' o -> in_output_trace client id out (tr ++ o) -> let (_, net) := s' in output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net))
TR_obligation_1 : forall (s s' : list Net.name * network) (tr o : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refl_trans_1n_trace step_failure step_failure_init s tr -> step_failure s s' o -> (let (_, net) := s in output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net))) -> let (_, net) := s' in output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net))
step_failure_star_raft_intermediate_reachable : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> raft_intermediate_reachable net
in_output_trace_step_output_correct : forall (failed failed' : list Net.name) (net net' : network) (os : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))), in_output_trace client id out os -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') os -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net'))
output_correct_invariant : forall (client0 : clientId) (id0 : nat) (out0 : output) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> in_output_trace client0 id0 out0 tr -> output_correct client0 id0 out0 (applied_entries (nwState net)) where ?orig_base_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aemi : applied_entries_monotonic_interface smci : state_machine_correct_interface si : sorted_interface lacimi : lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface lmi : log_matching_interface client : clientId id : nat out : output |- BaseParams] ?one_node_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams...
TR = {| TraceRelations.init := step_failure_init; T := in_output_trace client id out; T_dec := in_output_trace_dec; R := fun s : list Net.name * network => let (_, net) := s in output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net)); R_monotonic := fun (s s' : list Net.name * network) (tr o : list (Net.name * (input + list output))) (H : refl_trans_1n_trace step_failure step_failure_init s tr) (H0 : step_failure s s' o) (H1 : let (_, net) := s in output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net))) => TR_obligation_1 s s' tr o H H0 H1; T_false_init := TR_obligation_2; T_implies_R := fun (tr : list...
in_output_changed : forall tr o : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)), ~ in_output_trace client id out tr -> in_output_trace client id out (tr ++ o) -> in_output_trace client id out o
in_output_trace_inp_inv : forall (h : name) (i : raft_input) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))), in_output_trace client id out ((h, inl i) :: tr) -> in_output_trace client id out tr
step_failure_star_raft_intermediate_reachable_extend : forall (f : list Net.name) (net : network) (f' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star (f, net) (f', net') tr -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net'
step_failure_star_raft_intermediate_reachable' : forall (n' : list Net.name * network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init n' tr -> raft_intermediate_reachable (snd n')
in_output_trace_dec : forall tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)), {in_output_trace client id out tr} + {~ in_output_trace client id out tr}
RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net'
Build_applied_entries_monotonic_interface : (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (os : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') os -> exists es : list entry, applied_entries (nwState net') = applied_entries (nwState net) ++ es) ->...-> applied_entries_monotonic_interface
applied_entries_monotonic : forall (e : entry) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (os : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') os -> In e (applied_entries (nwState net)) -> In e (applied_entries (nwState net'))
Record applied_entries_monotonic_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_applied_entries_monotonic_interface { applied_entries_monotonic' : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (os : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') os ->...-> In e (applied_entries (nwState net')) } Arguments applied_entries_monotonic_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_applied_entries_monotonic_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
applied_entries_monotonic' : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (os : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') os -> exists es : list entry, applied_entries (nwState net') = applied_entries (nwState net) ++ es
output_correct_prefix : forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output), Prefix l1 l2 -> output_correct client id out l1 -> output_correct client id out l2
in_output_trace_singleton_inv : forall (h : name) (l : list raft_output), in_output_trace client id out [(h, inr l)] -> in_output_list client id out l
client_cache_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output), getLastId (nwState net h) client = Some (id, out) -> output_correct client id out (rev (removeAfterIndex (log (nwState net h)) (lastApplied (nwState net h)))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments client_cache_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
doGenericServer_output_correct : forall (h : name) (ps : list packet) (sigma : Net.name -> data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps; nwState := sigma |} -> doGenericServer h (sigma h) = (os, st', ms) -> in_output_list client id out os -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st'))
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) ->...-> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aemi : applied_entries_monotonic_interface smci : state_machine_correct_interface si : sorted_interface lacimi : lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface lmi : log_matching_interface client : clientId id : nat out : output |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aemi : applied_entries_monotonic_interface smci : state_machine_correct_interface si : sorted_interface lacimi : lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface lmi : log_matching_interface client : clientId id : nat out : output |- Type]
in_output_trace_not_nil = fun H : exists (os : list raft_output) (_ : name), False /\ in_output_list client id out os => match H with | ex_intro _ x (ex_intro _ _ H1) => and_ind (fun (H2 : False) (_ : in_output_list client id out x) => False_ind False H2) H1 end : in_output_trace client id out [] -> False
step_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l
step_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l
TR_obligation_2 = fun H : exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) [] /\ in_output_list client id out os => match H with | ex_intro _ x (ex_intro _ x0 H1) => and_ind (fun (H2 : In (x0, inr x) []) (_ : in_output_list client id out x) => H2) H1 end : ~ in_output_trace client id out []
Inductive step_failure (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (params : FailureParams P) : step_relation (list Net.name * network) (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name...
doLeader_key_in_output_list : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)), doLeader st h = (os, st', m) -> ~ in_output_list client id out os
handleInput_in_output_list : forall (h : name) (i : raft_input) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleInput h i st = (os, st', ms) -> ~ in_output_list client id out os
